name: Battlethorne: Survivors
description:
Battlethorne Survivors is a third person action roguelite survival game with a focus on companions. Massacre hordes of fantastical beasts and collect gold for unlocking powerful trinkets to take on even harder maps and Bosses.

Key Features

  • Fight thousands of fantastical beasts
  • Over 20 Unique enemy types with their own unique attacks
  • Over 30 Companions to Unlock
  • Unlock hundreds of trinkets to power up your character
  • 6 maps with 12 Difficulty tiers
  • Choose from 18 characters
  • 5 Bosses to defeat
